value.title: Deep dive into measure filters in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: In this video, we perform a deep analysis of the DAX queries generated by Power BI when you use a measure as a filter in a Power BI visual. The DAX code generated might show a different behavior whether the measure is part of the values shown in the visual or not.  Article and download: https://sql.bi/721618?aff=yt
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/miiGlDWeamM" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Filtering a measure in DAX Studio
value.excerpt: DAX Studio can evaluate one or more measures in a query. Marco Russo shows how to apply filters to a measure executed in DAX Studio. Continuous learning to improve your productivity!  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/ DAX Studio: https://daxstudio.org/
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ZIJDv3J9kko" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Previous year up to a certain date
value.excerpt: This video describes how to compute previous year values up to a certain date in DAX and Power BI. This technique is useful in case the data is presenting incomplete months or years. Article and download: https://sql.bi/352723?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt The definitive
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/bAOs5LTP0I0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Propagating filters using TREATAS in DAX
value.excerpt: How to create a virtual relationship in DAX using the TREATAS function. Article and download: https://sql.bi/41311/?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt The definitive guide to DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/books/the-definitive-guide-to-dax-2nd-edition/?aff=yt

value.title: Show last 13 months based on user single slicer selection

value.title: Using KEEPFILTERS in DAX
value.excerpt: This video explains how to use KEEPFILTERS to intersect instead of overriding an existing filter context in DAX. Using FEEPFILTERS simplifies the code and improves performance. Article and download: https://sql.bi/751682?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt The definitive
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/AshR4OYdMBg" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Variables in DAX
value.excerpt: Using variables in DAX makes the code easier to read, faster, and easier to debug. Learn how and when to use variables, along with why they are so important in any DAX expression. Article and download: https://sql.bi/760161?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt The definitive

value.title: When to use KEEPFILTERS over iterators
value.excerpt: How to use KEEPFILTERS in DAX iterator functions to preserve arbitrarily shaped filters in context transition.  Article and download: https://sql.bi/705054?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt The definitive guide to DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/books/the-definitive-guide-to-dax-2nd-edition/?aff=yt

value.title: Govern data across an enterprise
value.excerpt: Govern data across an enterprise

topItems.title: Discover trusted data using Microsoft Purview
Manage Power BI assets by using Microsoft Purview
topItems.excerpt: Improve data governance and asset discovery using Power BI and Microsoft Purview integration.

value.title: Implement advanced data visualization techniques by using Power BI
value.excerpt: Implement advanced data visualization techniques by using Power BI

topItems.title: Understand advanced data visualization concepts
topItems.excerpt: Create cohesive, inclusive, and efficient Power BI reports to effectively communicate results.

topItems.title: Monitor data in real-time with Power BI
topItems.excerpt: Describe real-time analytics in Power BI using automatic page refresh, real-time dashboards, and auto-refresh in paginated reports.

topItems.title: Create paginated reports
topItems.excerpt: Paginated reports allow report developers to create Power BI artifacts that have tightly controlled rendering requirements. Paginated reports are ideal for creating sales invoices, receipts, purchase orders, and tabular data. This module will teach you how to create reports, add parameters, and work with tables and charts in paginated reports.

value.title: Becoming a solution architect for Dynamics 365 and Power Platform
value.excerpt: Learn how to become a solution architect.

value.title: Build systems of insights for enterprise scale with Power BI and Azure
value.excerpt: Build systems of insights for enterprise scale with Power BI and Azure

value.title: Choose a Power BI model framework
value.excerpt: Describe Power BI data model frameworks, their benefits and limitations, and features to help optimize your Power BI data models.

value.title: Discover customer needs as a Solution Architect for Dynamics 365 and Power Platform
value.excerpt: Learn how to ask customers questions about their business processes and feature requirements to create a viable solution.

value.title: Discover trusted data using Microsoft Purview
value.excerpt: purview, enterprise data analyst

value.title: Get started with data science in Microsoft Fabric
value.excerpt: Get started with data science in Microsoft Fabric by learning how to train a model in a notebook, and track your metrics with MLflow and experiments.

value.title: Get started with Real-Time Analytics in Microsoft Fabric
value.excerpt: Get started with Real-Time Analytics in Microsoft Fabric

value.title: Power Platform - Introduction, business value, and demos
value.excerpt: Explore the capabilities of Power Platform applications, as seen in demonstrations and customer case studies.

value.title: Manage datasets in Power BI
value.excerpt: With Microsoft Power BI, you can build multiple reports from a single dataset, meaning that if you change the dataset, all reports will be updated with that change. Additionally, you can clean and prep data once rather than repeatedly for each report.

value.title: Introduction to foundations in data modeling
value.excerpt: This module introduces the key concepts that are related to developing a well-organized data model.

value.title: Transcend data analysis together with Power BI and Excel
value.excerpt: This module introduces potential ways that people can use Excel and Power BI together. Power BI is a great tool for telling a story through visuals; occasionally, it's beneficial to use Excel for analysis. Excel can make a connection to a Power BI dataset, enabling you to analyze the data by using PivotTables.

value.title: Design interactive data experiences with Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: Power BI enables report authors to produce interactive reports using visuals, slicers, bookmarks, and more.

value.title: Introduction to modern analytics using Excel and Power BI
value.excerpt: This module introduces the Microsoft modern analytics core suite of tools, including Office 365/Excel 2016+, Power Query, Data Model, Power BI Desktop, and Power BI service. By using modern analytics technologies, you and your organization can work faster, more efficiently, and smarter by using Excel together with Power BI.

value.title: Secure, publish, and share data in Power BI
value.excerpt: This module reviews securing, sharing, and publishing Microsoft Power BI reports as part of Power BI service.

value.title: Enhance Power BI report designs for the user experience
value.excerpt: Enhance Power BI report designs for the user experience

value.title: Propose a solution as a Solution Architect for Power Platform and Dynamics 365
value.excerpt: Learn how to propose a solution.

value.title: Understand advanced data visualization concepts
value.excerpt: Create cohesive, inclusive, and efficient Power BI reports to effectively communicate results.

value.title: Use tools to optimize Power BI performance
value.excerpt: Use tools to develop, manage, and optimize Power BI data model and DAX query performance.

value.title: Cumulative Distribution Plot in Power BI
value.excerpt: Learn how to create cumulative distribution plot which is a great alternative to a histogram. Histogram can lead to binning bias that will provide different distribution of the same data.
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/oyo8OwTMM38" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Decision Tree Classifier - Machine Learning in Power BI
value.excerpt: Learn how to build a machine learning decision tree classifier in Power BI with some simple code. In the tutorial you will learn how to modify and visualize the model output so that you get the best results  This will be achieved with simple Python code.
